actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from Federal Reserve System, Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, Federal Home Loan Bank Board, Comptroller of the Currency, Treasury Department.
Committee on Banking received executive comment from Comptroller of the Currency.
Committee on Banking received executive comment from Federal Home Loan Bank Board.
Committee on Banking received executive comment from Federal Home Loan Bank Board.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide Geographic Deregulation of Banking.

summary.text: Banking Geographic Deregulation Act of 1983 - Amends the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to permit a bank holding company to annually apply to acquire additional banks in any two States, except that a State may elect to prohibit such acquisition by out-of-State bank holding companies.

titles.title: A bill to provide Geographic Deregulation of Banking.
